document_data.name: ''The Answerer''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Answerer''''' was an [[Item enchantment|enchanted]] [[longsword]] that had to power to weaken the defenses of its wielder's foes.
document_data.Description: It possessed a very unique design that made it difficult for the wielder to make a strong start in combat.
document_data.Powers: To counteract the drawbacks of its form, ''the Answerer'' possessed the unique power to weaken the physical defense and [[magic]]al resistances of any creature it struck. This effect became more intense with each additional strike that landed.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, the sword was owned by [[Jamis Tombelthen]], a general of the [[Tethyrian army]].
